actionConfiguration.body:
-- getOrderDetails - Fetch details for a specific order
SELECT 
  o.order_id, 
  o.items, 
  o.shipping_address, 
  o.subtotal, 
  o.taxes, 
  o.shipping, 
  o.carrier, 
  o.weight_kg, 
  o.weight_lbs, 
  o.dimensions, 
  o.tracking_no, 
  o.total, 
  o.delivery_status, 
  o.created
FROM db_orders o
WHERE o.order_id = {{appsmith.store.selectedOrderId}};
--
